story-moment.ULTRON PROGRAM: Fueling the growing friction among the Avengers, Tony Stark and Bruce Banner developed the Ultron Program where robotic sentries would take on cataclysmic threats, replacing the need for the Avengers.
story-moment.RESISTANCE: Ultron resisted the idea of existing only as a consciousness and global peacekeeping initiative designed by Mr. Stark
story-moment.USING THE MAXIMOFFS: Manipulating twins Wanda and Pietro Maximoff’s hatred of Tony Stark, Ultron used them as a distraction against the Avengers as he devised a plan in Sokovia to cleanse the planet, leaving room for his robotic populace.
story-moment.REGENERATION CRADLE: Ultron ordered Dr. Helen Cho to use her Regeneration Cradle combined with Vibranium and the Mind Stone to create an ultra-powerful body for him to inhabit.
story-moment.VISION ENDS ULTRON: With one last burst of intense hatred for humanity, Ultron lunged at Vision, but the Avenger blasted him out of existence with the Mind Stone ending his reign of terror.

powers+abilities.ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE: Born out of the Mind Stone and Tony Stark’s brain patterns, Ultron can use his incredible artificial intelligence to access every piece of data available on Earth with astonishing quickness.
powers+abilities.KILLER DRONES: Ultron has the ability to transfer his consciousness to any computer system ranging from assembly line bots to killer drones, and command them to do his bidding.
